name: Bug Bomb
overview: Game description: In the year 2184 men were sent down into earth to wander the electronic grids that supply the human cities. However, giant bugs made it hard. You play as Henry who is one of the men that tried to get rid of the bugs. You shoot out bombs that bounce left and right or up and down. Those bombs can destroy you, so better watch out. Also you can not shoot more than 3 bombs at a time
